description:
Fukube Jin is an admiral of UESF (United Earth Space Forces) who was in charge of human fleet during First Battle of Mars. Unable to hit enemy ships with weapons he rammed his vessel into one of Jovian Chulips downing it to surface of Mars, where it destroyed a human colony from which Akito came from.
He later boards Nadesico as UN ambassador.
In episode 7 he sacrifices himself to allow Nadesico to escape from Mars.
name: Fukube Jin
